at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.model

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhooe.mcm.it.adid.model.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends Object
    The database manager for the sqlite database in which the notes get saved.
    Author:
    Mario Kraml

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseManager getInstance(Context _ctx)
        Returns an instance of the singleton object
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Returns:
        An instance of the singleton object

      • getNote

        public String getNote(int stepId)
        This method returns a String with the note of the specified step. The step is specified by the stepId. Returns null when no note with the given stepId is in the database.
        Parameters:
        step_id - The id of the note
        Returns:
        The note string associated with the step id OR null if there is no such note in the database

      • insertNote

        public void insertNote(int stepId,
              String text)
        Inserts a note string into the database. If the particular object already exists in the database then it will be updated.
        Parameters:
        stepId - The stepId of the note to insert. Is the primary key of the database table.
        text - The note string to insert

      • deleteNote

        public void deleteNote(int stepId,
              String text)
        Delete a note string with the step id from the database
        Parameters:
        stepId - The step id of the entry

      • deleteAllNotes

        public void deleteAllNotes()
        Deletes all notes in the database
